backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s data models for lobbies, tournaments, players, transactions, bidding state, Omaha game state, admin stats, and related types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend hooks, components, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the app and mounting the React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell handling tabs, authentication, admin checks, user profile loading, and Quick Play game mounting.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin panel for viewing system stats and updating the house cut percentage with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI indicator showing backend connection status using actor retry logic with tooltips for detailed status messages.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal handling deposits and withdrawals, including Flexa payment flow, wallet actions, and real-time status polling. Manages input validation, success/error states, and UI transitions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Card explaining how to publish an app live on the Internet Computer and providing tips about URLs and access. Includes guidance on draft, publish, and public ICP links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding, mode toggle, wallet connection controls, and deposit/withdraw modals. Integrates wallet providers and backend connectivity indicator.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin and ICP public link with copy-to-clipboard actions. Shows build metadata and handles copy success feedback.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: Lobby browser UI with a placeholder alert and quick-play options for Spades and Omaha. Supports switching based on game mode.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder lobby room component showing a 'coming soon' alert for multiplayer rooms.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal for creating user profiles in real or offline mode and saves profile data to backend or local storage.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Initializes and renders quick-play Spades or Omaha games, handling game state, actions, and exit behavior.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Shows a placeholder tournaments section with mode‑dependent descriptions and badges.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Provides a modal for connecting via WalletConnect, offering QR codes or mobile deep links and copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Prompts users to install a Web3 wallet extension and links to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask downloads.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Displays wallet balances, stats, and transaction history for real or offline mode and supports deposit/withdraw actions.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Implements a simple AI decision system for Omaha bots based on check, call, bet, or fold conditions.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Implements Omaha game logic including deck creation, shuffling, dealing, betting actions, and turn progression.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Evaluates Omaha hands by testing all valid 5‑card combos and ranks them to determine winners.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Defines Omaha-specific card, player, and game state types plus helpers for displaying suits.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Manages unified play sessions for Spades and Omaha, initializing games and routing actions with bot logic.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Provides simple Spades bot logic that selects the lowest legal playable card.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Implements Spades rules including deck handling, card validation, trick flow, and determining trick winners.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Defines Spades-specific card, player, trick, and game state types with display helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with connection state tracking, error handling, and retry awareness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, canister metadata, and game-related entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: Manages local quick-play game sessions, handling starting games, executing actions, and resetting session state with error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Implements Web3 wallet detection, connection, balance fetching, chain switching, and guest wallet generation with stateful React logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, custom CSS variables, animations, UI utilities, and themed components like cards and tables.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Provides chain metadata and placeholders for future WalletConnect/Web3Modal integration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Utility functions for resolving the current canister ID, generating IC gateway links, and copying text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including from hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining color tokens, layout settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, known issues, and existing feature requirements for fixing UI regressions and Quick Play game functionality.
